channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 11:29 Air alarm to Vinnytsia Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 11:29 Air alarm to Vinnytsia Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Vinnytsia_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
